## What are Chlorinated Paraffins?

Chlorinated paraffins (CPs) are commercial products that mainly consists of straight chain polychlorinated alkanes (PCAs). However, the CP products usually contain various impurities and byproducts that can make up a considerable proportion of the CP mixture.
